fixes.name: Policies Above Premium Threshold
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the Tableau IF expression to a DAX IF. Parameter [Min Premium Threshold] is mapped to SELECTEDVALUE('Min Premium Threshold'[Display As]) per parameter rules. All column references were converted to 'customers+'[ColumnName] format: [Premium] -> 'customers+'[Premium], [PolicyID] -> 'customers+'[PolicyID]. The measure returns the policy ID when the premium meets or exceeds the selected parameter value and BLANK() otherwise.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation references a parameter, and all parameter-based calculations must be measures.
